title: Lady Nadezhda Shadum

properties.name: description
properties.value: Lady Nadezhda Shadum is a trueborn vampyre found in the south-western area of Darkmeyer. She is the head of House Shadum.

content:

Lady Nadezhda Shadum

Advanced data
NPC ID9715

Lady Nadezhda Shadum is a trueborn vampyre found in the south-western area of Darkmeyer. She is the head of House Shadum.
